aoop.asteroids.gui

Class MenuPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • aoop.asteroids.gui.MenuPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MenuPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The Menu Panel contains buttons to go to each of the game modes, and to quit the game. Also, up-to-date high scores of the last hour and of all time are shown.
    Author:
    qqwy
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
